entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 29.1.knots20250903 released
entry.summary:
The latest release of Bitcoin Knots, version 29.1.knots20250903, is now available for download at [bitcoinknots.org](https://bitcoinknots.org/files/29.x/29.1.knots20250903/). This update introduces several new features alongside various bug fixes and performance enhancements aimed at improving the software's overall efficiency and reliability. Users are encouraged to contribute to the projectâ€™s development by reporting any encountered bugs through the dedicated issue tracker on GitHub, accessible at [GitHub issues page](https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/issues).
For those interested in staying up-to-date with the latest announcements or engaging with the community, subscription options are available at [Bitcoin Knots announcements](https://bitcoinknots.org/list/announcements/join/). Furthermore, detailed release notes that elaborate on the specifics of the updates and improvements made in version 29.1.knots20250903 can be found directly on the GitHub releases page at [Release notes](https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/releases/tag/v29.1.knots20250903).
This information is particularly relevant for members of the "Bitcoin Development Mailing List" group, indicating its significance within the broader context of Bitcoin development and the ongoing efforts to refine and advance this cryptocurrency's technical infrastructure.
